title: Trump gives Ukraine deadline to respond to his peace plan
shortDescription: Ukrainian President Volodymyr Zelenskyy is under pressure to accept President Donald Trump's 28-point plan to end the war with Russia.

title: Photos: Mr. Mamdani Goes to Washington as NYC mayor-elect meets Trump
shortDescription: President Donald Trump had nothing but good things to say about NYC Mayor-elect Zohran Mamdani following a White House meeting on Nov. 21.

title: Trump brushes off past criticisms from Mamdani
shortDescription: "I've been called much worse." President Donald Trump brushes off past criticisms from New York City Mayor-elect Zohran Mamdani.

title: Trump praises Mamdani after WH meeting
shortDescription: President Donald Trump said he would feel "very, very comfortable" in New York after meeting mayor-elect Zohran Mamdani.

title: Trump, Mamdani say WH meeting was 'productive'
shortDescription: President Donald Trump and New York Mayor-elect Zohran Mamdani said they had a productive meeting after trading weeks of insults and warnings.

title: See Trump host Mamdani at White House in first meeting
shortDescription: President Donald Trump met with New York City Mayor-elect Zohran Mamdani for the first time in the Oval Office of the White House on Nov. 21, 2025.

title: Arizona AG continues prosecution of Trump fake electors
shortDescription: Attorney General Mayes, a Democrat, had been weighing her options for months after adverse court rulings set back the controversial prosecution.

title: What to expect ahead of Trump-Mamdani meeting
shortDescription: USA TODAY reporter Swapna Venugopal shares what to expect from the anticipated meeting between mayor-elect Zohran Mamdani and President Donald Trump.

title: Trump says post 'not threatening' Democrats
shortDescription: President Donald Trump said his sedition post was 'not threatening' Democrats during a Fox News interview.

title: Trump says he's 'not threatening death' for 'seditious' Democrats
shortDescription: President Trump said he is not threatening death for six Democratic members of Congress he accused of sedition, but said they are in "serious trouble."

title: See U.S. Capitol Christmas tree arrive from Nevada forest
shortDescription: See the 53-foot red fir from Nevada’s Humboldt-Toiyabe Forest set on the Capitol’s West Lawn.

title: Trump meeting Mamdani today in DC. See schedule, livestream info
shortDescription: President Donald Trump has a meeting with NYC Mayor-elect Zohran Mamdani on Friday, Nov. 21. What is his schedule? Will the meeting be livestreamed?

title: Trump and Mamdani in chummy White House meeting: Live updates
shortDescription: "I expect to be helping him, not hurting him," Trump said of Mamdani, a democratic socialist who he previously denounced as "a communist."

title: Trump administration says it's hiring 'deportation judges'
shortDescription: The Trump administration says it is hiring more immigration judges and has begun referring to the positions as "deportation judges."

title: Trump reveals plan to end Russia-Ukraine war
shortDescription: The Trump Administration unveiled a preliminary 28-point peace plan for Russia and Ukraine with territorial concessions and NATO restrictions

title: Marjorie Taylor Greene took on Trump. Is she the real MAGA?
shortDescription: People who know Marjorie Taylor Greene say she speaks for MAGA when Donald Trump is off course. Her critics don't trust her changed demeanor.

title: Daily Briefing: Two New Yorkers at the White House
shortDescription: Donald Trump and Zohran Mamdani set for talks in Washington. Here is the news to know on Friday.

title: Ukraine and Russia offer guarded reactions to Trump peace plan
shortDescription: Ukrainian President Volodymyr Zelenskyy said U.S. military officials had presented 'their vision' for securing a peace deal with Russia.

title: What is Donald Trump's approval rating? 'My poll numbers just went down.'
shortDescription: Donald Trump said at the US-Saudi Investment Forum that “my poll numbers just went down.” What is his approval rating? See opinions about the economy.

title: 'Punishable by death': Trump decries Dems as seditionists. What does he mean?
shortDescription: The president accused a group of Democrats of "seditious behavior, punishable by death."

title: Democrats respond after Trump sedition claims
shortDescription: Democrats called President Trump's accusations of sedition against six lawmakers "unacceptable, unconscionable and un-American."

title: Revealed: Trump's 28-point plan to end Russia-Ukraine war
shortDescription: President Donald Trump's proposal to end Russia's war on Ukraine would require Ukraine to give up land and stay out of NATO.

title: White House defends Trump’s ‘piggy’ comment
shortDescription: The White House defended President Donald Trump as "frank and honest" after he called a reporter "piggy."
